title: My Pbe client won't open 2017
body: When I try to open my PBE client it won't show anything and this makes me annoyed. I tried to delete and redownload it and it still does that same problem. Does anyone know what to do plz tell me

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Deagonian ,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=her6Myn5,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-08-08T04:40:40.784+0000)
>
> When I try to open my PBE client it won&#039;t show anything and this makes me annoyed. I tried to delete and redownload it and it still does that same problem. Does anyone know what to do plz tell me

Try to go in the folder of the PBE from the file explorer and scroll down into the folder until you find an application called "lol.launcher.admin". Then double tap it to open. Enter you admin password and it will open. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

It may be that something is blocking the client from opening up, such as a firewall or another background program. Let's have you try running through our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104) to see if that resolves the issue for you.
I followed every step that it showed and still doesn't popup the league of legends icon
Then the next step is to submit a [ticket over to our Tech Team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)! They will deep dive into the issue and get you back into game.
